```{r libraries}
# Load packages
library(bayesrules)
library(tidyverse)
library(rstanarm)
library(broom.mixed)
library(tidybayes)
library(forcats)
library(bayesplot)
library(lubridate)
library(nflfastR)
```

```{r}
test <- read.csv('first.model.csv')
```


```{r}
first_model <- stan_glmer(
  win ~ wins.x + loss.x + wins.y + loss.y + (1 | week) + (1 | team) + (1 | opp.team),
  data = test,
  family = binomial,
  chains = 4, iter = 5000*2, seed = 84735, refresh = 0)
```

```{r}
classification_summary(first_model, data = test)
```
